member.name: T:BundleTestApp.App
member.summary: Provides application-specific behavior to supplement the default Application class.

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.App.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the singleton application object. This is the first line of authored code executed, and as such is the logical equivalent of main() or WinMain().

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.App.OnLaunched(Windows.ApplicationModel.Activation.LaunchActivatedEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when the application is launched normally by the end user. Other entry points will be used when the application is launched to open a specific file, to display search results, and so forth.
member.param: Details about the launch request and process.

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.App.RootFrame_FirstNavigated(System.Object,Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Restores the content transitions after the app has launched.
member.param: The object where the handler is attached.

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.App.OnSuspending(System.Object,Windows.ApplicationModel.SuspendingEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when application execution is being suspended. Application state is saved without knowing whether the application will be terminated or resumed with the contents of memory still intact.
member.param: The source of the suspend request.

member.name: T:BundleTestApp.MainPage
member.summary: An empty page that can be used on its own or navigated to within a Frame.

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.MainPage.OnNavigatedTo(Windows.UI.Xaml.Navigation.NavigationEventArgs)
member.summary: Invoked when this page is about to be displayed in a Frame.
member.param: Event data that describes how this page was reached. This parameter is typically used to configure the page.

member.name: T:BundleTestApp.TestBundleable
member.summary: This class represents a simple object that can be packed and unpacked from a bundle.

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.TestBundleable.Bundle_Library#IBundleable#packObject(System.String,Bundle_Library.Bundle)
member.summary: Pack this object into a bundle
member.param: the key that it will be stored with in the bundle
The bundle to pack it in

member.name: M:BundleTestApp.TestBundleable.Bundle_Library#IBundleable#unpackOoject(System.String,Bundle_Library.Bundle)
member.summary: Unpack this object from the bundle
member.param: the key that it was stored with in the bundle
The bundle that it is packed in
member.returns: the unpacked object from the bundle
